-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Haskell bindings to Google's Compact Language Detector 2
--   
@package cld2
@version 0.1.0.1


-- | This module provides simple Haskell bindings for Compact Language
--   Detector 2, a language-detection library used by Google Chrome. See
--   <a>https://code.google.com/p/cld2/</a>.
module Text.CLD2

-- | This function is the most general way to invoke CLD2. Since setting
--   debug flags can cause output on stderr, the result is returned in the
--   IO monad.
detectLanguageDebug :: Text -> Bool -> Hints -> DebugFlags -> IO Result

-- | Call <a>detectLanguageDebug</a> with all debug flags disabled and call
--   <a>unsafePerformIO</a> on the result. This is the recommended function
--   for most use cases.
detectLanguage :: Text -> Bool -> Hints -> Result

-- | Call <a>detectLanguage</a> on HTML input with no hints and return the
--   <tt>resultSimple</tt> field of the result.
detectLanguageSimple :: Text -> Language

-- | An enumeration of all languages recognized by CLD2
data Language
Cld2Language_ENGLISH :: Language
Cld2Language_DANISH :: Language

Cld2Language_FINNISH :: Language

Cld2Language_X_Chakma :: Language
Cld2Language_X_Meroitic_Cursive :: Language
Cld2Language_X_Meroitic_Hieroglyphs :: Language
Cld2Language_X_Miao :: Language
Cld2Language_X_Sharada :: Language
Cld2Language_X_Sora_Sompeng :: Language
Cld2Language_X_Takri :: Language

-- | A collection of contextual clues which can help improve the accuracy
--   of language detection
data Hints
Hints :: Maybe String -> Maybe String -> Encoding -> Language -> Hints

-- | The value of the <tt>Content-Language</tt> HTTP header
hintContentLanguage :: Hints -> Maybe String

-- | The TLD of the website which served the corpus being analyzed
hintTLD :: Hints -> Maybe String

-- | The original character encoding of the corpus
hintEncoding :: Hints -> Encoding

-- | A hint from any other available context
hintLanguage :: Hints -> Language

-- | The default set of hints, which is <tt>Hints</tt> <tt>Nothing</tt>
--   <tt>Nothing</tt> <tt>Cld2Encoding_UNKNOWN_ENCODING</tt>
--   <tt>Cld2Language_UNKNOWN_LANGUAGE</tt>
defaultHints :: Hints

-- | An enumeration of character encodings which can be included in
--   <a>Hints</a>
data Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_1 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_2 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_3 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_4 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_5 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_6 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_7 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_8 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_9 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_10 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_JAPANESE_EUC_JP :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_JAPANESE_SHIFT_JIS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_JAPANESE_JIS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CHINESE_BIG5 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CHINESE_GB :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CHINESE_EUC_CN :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_KOREAN_EUC_KR :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UNICODE_UNUSED :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CHINESE_EUC_DEC :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CHINESE_CNS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CHINESE_BIG5_CP950 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_JAPANESE_CP932 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UTF8 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UNKNOWN_ENCODING :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ASCII_7BIT :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_RUSSIAN_KOI8_R :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_RUSSIAN_CP1251 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP1252 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_RUSSIAN_KOI8_RU :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP1250 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_15 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP1254 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP1257 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_11 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP874 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP1256 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP1255 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_8_I :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_HEBREW_VISUAL :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CZECH_CP852 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_CZECH_CSN_369103 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MSFT_CP1253 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_RUSSIAN_CP866 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_8859_13 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_2022_KR :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_GBK :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_GB18030 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_BIG5_HKSCS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_ISO_2022_CN :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TSCII :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAMIL_MONO :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAMIL_BI :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_JAGRAN :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_MACINTOSH_ROMAN :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UTF7 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_BHASKAR :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_HTCHANAKYA :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UTF16BE :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UTF16LE :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UTF32BE :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UTF32LE :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_BINARYENC :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_HZ_GB_2312 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_UTF8UTF8 :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAM_ELANGO :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAM_LTTMBARANI :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAM_SHREE :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAM_TBOOMIS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAM_TMNEWS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_TAM_WEBTAMIL :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_KDDI_SHIFT_JIS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_DOCOMO_SHIFT_JIS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_SOFTBANK_SHIFT_JIS :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_KDDI_ISO_2022_JP :: Encoding
Cld2Encoding_SOFTBANK_ISO_2022_JP :: Encoding

-- | Flags which cause CLD2 to dump debugging output to stderr.
data DebugFlags
DebugFlags :: Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> DebugFlags
debugFlagScoreAsQuads :: DebugFlags -> Bool
debugFlagHtml :: DebugFlags -> Bool
debugFlagCr :: DebugFlags -> Bool
debugFlagVerbose :: DebugFlags -> Bool
debugFlagQuiet :: DebugFlags -> Bool
debugFlagEcho :: DebugFlags -> Bool

-- | The default set of debugging flags, all <tt>False</tt>
defaultDebugFlags :: DebugFlags

-- | The result of performing language detection on a corpus
data Result
Result :: Language -> (Language, Language, Language) -> (Int, Int, Int) -> (Double, Double, Double) -> [Chunk] -> Int -> Bool -> Result

-- | The primary language of the corpus
resultSimple :: Result -> Language

-- | The top three most prevalent languages in the corpus
resultTop3 :: Result -> (Language, Language, Language)

-- | The
resultTop3Percent :: Result -> (Int, Int, Int)

-- | Confidence scores for the top three most prevalent languages
resultTop3Score :: Result -> (Double, Double, Double)

-- | Identifies the language of each chunk of the corpus
resultChunks :: Result -> [Chunk]

-- | The size of the corpus that was analyzed
resultTextBytes :: Result -> Int

-- | Whether this result should be considered reliable
resultIsReliable :: Result -> Bool

-- | Represents a range of text and its detected language
data Chunk
Chunk :: Int -> Int -> Language -> Chunk

-- | The offset of the start of the chunk, in bytes
chunkOffset :: Chunk -> Int

-- | The size of the chunk, in bytes
chunkSize :: Chunk -> Int

-- | The detected language of this chunk
chunkLanguage :: Chunk -> Language
instance Typeable Language
instance Typeable Encoding
instance Typeable Hints
instance Typeable DebugFlags
instance Typeable Chunk
instance Typeable Result
instance Eq Language
instance Ord Language
instance Show Language
instance Bounded Language
instance Enum Language
instance Data Language
instance Eq Encoding
instance Ord Encoding
instance Show Encoding
instance Bounded Encoding
instance Enum Encoding
instance Data Encoding
instance Eq Hints
instance Ord Hints
instance Show Hints
instance Data Hints
instance Eq DebugFlags
instance Ord DebugFlags
instance Show DebugFlags
instance Data DebugFlags
instance Eq Chunk
instance Ord Chunk
instance Show Chunk
instance Data Chunk
instance Eq Result
instance Ord Result
instance Show Result
instance Data Result
